rules_text: At the beginning of your upkeep surveil 1, then rejuvenate 1, if you exile a land this way create a 1/1 green Nopon creature token, otherwise tapped treasure token. [i](To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard. Exile a card from your graveyard, then you may play a permanent card with mana value 1 or less from among them until end of turn.)[/i]
